body_html: Also, we can probably get rid of that annoying None parameters and modules. Now you can conditionally assign them, instead of passing them to the constructor. But that's a thing for another commit.
body_text: Also, we can probably get rid of that annoying None parameters and modules. Now you can conditionally assign them, instead of passing them to the constructor. But that's a thing for another commit.
body: Also, we can probably get rid of that annoying `None` parameters and modules. Now you can conditionally assign them, instead of passing them to the constructor. But that's a thing for another commit.
